title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1241.5 - Restricted area use
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1241.5 - Restricted area use

State Regulations

No person shall enter any restricted area of a terminal
posted as being closed to the public, except: (a) persons assigned to duty
therein; (b) authorized
representatives of the Port Authority; and
(c) persons having permission of the
manager

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1241.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
